tooltip.detailed.functionality.fish_trap:
Place to increase luck:
 • Amethyst crystals
 • Gold blocks
 • Mob heads
Works within 5 blocks (2 of each for max luck).
Higher light level speeds it up.
Water depth increases catch amount.
tooltip.detailed.functionality.chunk_loa:
• Right click - configure radius.
 • Sneak + Right click - Toggle radius rendering.
tooltip.functionality.chevon: Has earthy scent and firm texture.
tooltip.functionality.cooked_chevon: Very chewy and has jump-boosting capabilities
tooltip.functionality.sniffon: It has a herbal, old smell. Might be edible after cooking.
tooltip.functionality.cooked_sniffon: An ancient treat with healthy properties.
tooltip.functionality.gilded_sniffon: Even healthier than its plain variant.
tooltip.functionality.frog_leg: Looks disgusting and smells like swamp. Better not eat it raw.
tooltip.functionality.cooked_frog_leg: A light, crunchy snack. Removes one negative effect.
tooltip.functionality.terrapin: Stinks of mud and might be poisonous.
tooltip.functionality.terrapin_soup: Smells delicious and is perfect for underwater travels.
tooltip.functionality.fins: They make you swim much faster!
tooltip.functionality.obsidian_fins: They make you able to swim quite fast in lava!
tooltip.detailed.functionality.obsidian_: You might want to be fire resistant for that.
tooltip.functionality.inferno_gear: Provides fire resistance and clear vision in lava.
tooltip.functionality.sleeping_herb: Makes you able to sleep during the night no matter what.
tooltip.functionality.phantom_herb: Makes phantoms spawn like you didn't sleep for a while.
tooltip.functionality.chorus_herb: Teleports you to your spawn point.
tooltip.functionality.crimson_herb: Grants immunity to poison and wither.
tooltip.functionality.glow_herb: Grants immunity to void damage, levitation, and angering Endermen.
tooltip.functionality.glow_torch: Works underwater and is unaffected by moving liquids.
tooltip.detailed.functionality.harpoon:
• Tripled reach underwater.
 • Attracts mob drops underwater.
 • Restores air on kill.
 • It's fragile, but highly enchantable.
tooltip.functionality.pheromones: A universal tame mixture for animals.
tooltip.detailed.functionality.pheromone: Right click on any tamable mob to make it your friend!
tooltip.functionality.phantom_treat: Feed it to any animal to make it much faster.
tooltip.detailed.functionality.ancient_s:
Right click to start searching.
Consumes experience levels.
information.functionality.treasure_sacks: Over-harvesting treasure sacks empties them in the area. Wait a few days to refill.
information.functionality.infinite_water: Place any of the listed blocks below a cauldron to make it an infinite water source.
information.functionality.night_vision_p: Use an empty bottle on a glow squid to get a night vision potion. It might hurt!
information.functionality.throwable_disc: Music discs are throwable. Gotta catch em all!
information.functionality.thunder_ritual: Copper block + four torches + heart of the sea = thunderstorm.
